name: real-estate-fractionalization-dapp
description: A decentralized application for real estate fractionalization

scripts.dev: set NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation && concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../contracts && npm install
scripts.deploy: cd contracts && npx hardhat run deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:check: cd contracts && npx hardhat run deploy.js --network localhost && node ../scripts/update-addresses.js

author: Real Estate Fractionalization Team
